Title: Miracle on 34th Street
Writer: Valentine Davies (story), George Seaton, George Seaton (screenplay), John Hughes (screenplay)
Actors: Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Dylan McDermott, J.T. Walsh
Plot: A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.
Language: English, American Sign Language, Dutch, Italian, Russian, Swahili
